CustomField.description: When the kickoff of a Milestone or Project is changed and the deadline is not changed, this setting causes the deadline of that Milestone/Project to shift by the same number of days as the Kickoff.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: When the kickoff of a Milestone or Project is changed and the deadline is not changed, this setting causes the deadline of that Milestone/Project to shift by the same number of days as the Kickoff.
CustomField.label: Shift Proj/MS Deadline When Kickoff Set
